meanings.definition: A type of elastic cord used for securing items.
meanings.sent1: I used bungees to tie down the tarp on the truck.
meanings.sent2: The camper used bungees to hold the tent in place.
meanings.sent3: The bungees danced in the wind, keeping the boxes safe.
meanings.sent4: His trust in the bungees was like a safety net in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bungees stretched like playful rubber bands.

meanings.definition: To secure or fasten with bungees.
meanings.sent1: She decided to bungees the luggage to the roof of the car.
meanings.sent2: We bungees the kayak to the trailer before heading to the lake.
meanings.sent3: He bungees the door shut to keep the surprise party a secret.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship bungees them together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The idea bungees their plans into a solid, achievable goal.
